test_cases.description: Verify that gratuity description/remark field becomes editable when gratuity amount is zero (currently blocked by system logic)
validation_hints: Locate form elements and verify interactivity

test_cases.description: Verify that EOS calculation displays specific, descriptive error messages instead of generic 'Something went wrong' error
test_cases.expected_ui_behavior: Verify Error message clarity in EOS
validation_hints: Check element visibility based on state

test_cases.description: Verify End of Services tab is hidden for offboarded employees and visible for active employees in employee profile
validation_hints: Check element visibility based on state

test_cases.description: Verify gratuity accrual report displays column headers and labels for 'Accrual up to previous payroll cycle close' and 'Total accrual amount'
validation_hints: Check element visibility based on state

test_cases.description: Verify EOS transaction form submission workflow for offboarded employees and error message display
validation_hints: Locate form elements and verify interactivity

test_cases.description: Verify that Final Settlement Amount field is visible and displays correctly on EOS calculation screen; check that UI clearly shows how deductions are applied to total
validation_hints: Check element visibility based on state

test_cases.description: Verify that gratuity cap calculation field in accrual report displays and is based on Gross salary (not Basic salary only)
validation_hints: Check element visibility based on state

test_cases.description: Verify column headers in gratuity file export match the data displayed in corresponding columns (e.g., 'hire date' column shows hire dates, not TL names)
Verify month labeling is clear in gratuity file download interface and employee profile to prevent confusion between months
validation_hints: Check element visibility based on state

test_cases.description: Verify Gratuity Report includes customization options, filtering mechanisms, and displays required information fields (specific fields per requirements)
validation_hints: Check element visibility based on state

test_cases.description: Verify error message 'Employee does not have any salary configuration' appears only when salary configuration is actually missing, not when it exists
validation_hints: Locate form elements and verify interactivity

test_cases.description: Verify Employee ID and Office columns are present in downloaded Gratuity export file
Verify gratuity liability report total calculation excludes non-monetary columns (e.g., Tenure in Years) and only sums gratuity amount columns
Verify Gratuity field is available in custom payroll report template dropdown and displays correctly when report is downloaded
validation_hints: Locate form elements and verify interactivity

test_cases.description: Verify payroll accrual reports (Air Ticket Allowance, Gratuity Accrual, Leave Salary Accrual) are accessible for multiple closed payroll cycles, not just the most recent
validation_hints: Check element visibility based on state

test_cases.description: Verify error message appears when submitting EOS transaction; check error message text and visibility
Verify gratuity description text displayed in EOS form for Qatar clients; check if description references correct country labor law
validation_hints: Check element visibility based on state

selector_hints: Look for element with text containing: "Finance menu navigation"

Look for element with text containing: "Payroll table display"
Try: [role="tab"], .tab, [data-tab], .nav-tab
Look for element with text containing: "Employee selection dropdown"
Try: select, [role="combobox"], [role="listbox"], .dropdown
Look for element with text containing: "Departure date picker field"
Try: input, textarea, [contenteditable], .input-field
Look for element with text containing: "Departure reason dropdown selector"
Try: select, [role="combobox"], [role="listbox"], .dropdown
Look for element with text containing: "Contract type selector (Limited/Unlimited)"
Try: select, [role="combobox"], [role="listbox"], .dropdown
Look for element with text containing: "End of Service button/link"
Try: button, [role="button"], .btn, input[type="submit"], input[type="button"]
Look for element with text containing: "Gratuity amount display field"
Try: input, textarea, [contenteditable], .input-field
Look for element with text containing: "Leave encashment display field"
Try: input, textarea, [contenteditable], .input-field
Look for element with text containing: "Monthly pay display field"
Try: input, textarea, [contenteditable], .input-field
Look for element with text containing: "Additions section and input fields"
Try: button, [role="button"], .btn, input[type="submit"], input[type="button"]
Look for element with text containing: "Deductions section and input fields"
Try: input, textarea, [contenteditable], .input-field
Look for element with text containing: "Total settlement amount display"
Look for element with text containing: "Submit transaction button"
Try: button, [role="button"], .btn, input[type="submit"], input[type="button"]
Look for element with text containing: "Menu icon on Payroll Table"
Try: [role="tab"], .tab, [data-tab], .nav-tab
Look for element with text containing: "Download Gratuity File option"
Try: input[type="radio"], [role="radio"]
Look for element with text containing: "Computation date picker"
Try: input[type="date"], .date-picker, [data-testid*="date"]
Look for element with text containing: "Export/Download button"
Try: button, [role="button"], .btn, input[type="submit"], input[type="button"]
Look for element with text containing: "Gratuity description/remark field (editable state)"
Try: input, textarea, [contenteditable], .input-field
Look for element with text containing: "Error message display area"

task_flows.flow_name: Process End of Service for Single Employee
steps: Add or modify deductions if needed
System calculates and displays gratuity amount
task_flows.source_article: How to calculate gratuity for an individual employee

steps: Export gratuity file with all employee liabilities
task_flows.source_article: How to calculate your total gratuity liability for all employees

duplicate_groups.consolidated_test: Verify EOS transaction processing displays clear, specific error messages when calculation fails, and allows users to edit and resubmit transactions smoothly
Verify End of Services tab visibility state changes based on employee offboarding status in employee profile

duplicate_groups.theme: EOS UI Labels and Column Headers
duplicate_groups.consolidated_test: Verify gratuity accrual report displays all required column headers and labels with proper text content

duplicate_groups.theme: EOS Form Submission and Error Handling
duplicate_groups.consolidated_test: Verify EOS transaction form submission workflow completes successfully and error messages display appropriately
Backend calculation verification - Cannot test with Playwright as these require mathematical formula validation and business logic verification
Verify gratuity report/file export UI displays correct month labels, properly aligned column headers with data, and includes customization/filtering options

Verify gratuity export functionality includes all required columns (Employee ID, Office, Gratuity Amount), correctly calculates totals by summing only monetary columns, and displays gratuity data in custom payroll report templates

duplicate_groups.theme: EOS form field visibility and interaction
duplicate_groups.consolidated_test: Test EOS submission form displays all required fields (departure date, reason, contract type), error messages appear correctly, and country-specific text displays appropriately

not_testable_tickets.summary: BE: Rename existing "Leave Encashments" labels to "Leave Encashments for End of Service"
not_testable_tickets.reason: Won't Do status - ticket cancelled, no implementation to test

not_testable_tickets.summary: Calculation of Leave Encashment in EOS
not_testable_tickets.reason: Cancelled status - no implementation exists to test

not_testable_tickets.summary: can't process the end of service for an employee
not_testable_tickets.reason: Resolved status - bug already fixed, nothing to test now

not_testable_tickets.summary: Couldn't change the hiring date of the employee
not_testable_tickets.reason: Cancelled status - feature request not implemented

not_testable_tickets.summary: Couldn't request end of service of an employee
not_testable_tickets.reason: Resolved status - bug already fixed
Closed status - feature request completed or rejected, no active testing needed
Closed status - support ticket resolved
Backend calculation bug - Playwright cannot verify mathematical correctness of service duration calculations or validate against manual date counting methods
Requires verification of backend calculation logic for leap year adjustments; Playwright cannot validate mathematical accuracy of gratuity formulas

not_testable_tickets.summary: End of service pro rated amount isssue
not_testable_tickets.reason: Status is Resolved; bug already fixed. Cannot test a resolved issue. Also requires backend decimal precision validation
Status is Resolved; feature request for backend reopen/reverse mechanism already implemented. Cannot test resolved feature
Requires validation of backend tenure calculation logic and comparison with MOHRE records; Playwright cannot verify calculation accuracy
Requires verification of gratuity calculation correctness against labor law formulas; Playwright cannot validate mathematical accuracy
Status is Cancelled; issue will not be addressed. No test needed
Requires validation of backend calculation logic for mid-month departures and unpaid leave adjustments; Playwright cannot verify calculation accuracy
Resolved ticket; backend calculation discrepancy (AED 231,821 vs AED 252,485) requires business logic verification, not UI testing
Resolved ticket; backend calculation logic for payslip vs settlement letter generation is not testable via UI automation

not_testable_tickets.summary: GOSI Calculated in EOS while it is already submitted
not_testable_tickets.reason: Resolved ticket; backend calculation bug involving duplicate GOSI deductions requires database/calculation logic verification

not_testable_tickets.summary: Gratuity Accrual report - calculation of closing/opening balance and new hire
not_testable_tickets.reason: Resolved ticket; backend calculation of opening/closing balances across payroll cycles is not testable via UI
Closed ticket; dynamic recalculation of historical values requires backend data consistency verification

not_testable_tickets.summary: Gratuity amount not considering leap year days
not_testable_tickets.reason: Resolved ticket; leap year calculation logic is backend business logic, not UI testable
Resolved ticket; backend calculation logic for UAE Labor Law 2021 compliance is not UI testable
Resolved ticket; backend calculation methodology discrepancy requires business logic verification
Resolved ticket; leap year handling in calculations is backend logic, not UI testable
Backend calculation logic for prorated leave accrual during partial month offboarding; Playwright cannot verify mathematical correctness of accrual formulas
Backend calculation logic for gratuity amounts; Playwright cannot verify if calculated values match expected manual calculations or business rules
Backend calculation logic for limited contract employee gratuity; Playwright cannot verify mathematical correctness of department-specific calculations
Backend calculation issue (AED 0 amounts) and historical data retrieval; Playwright cannot verify correctness of calculated gratuity amounts or database query results
Backend calculation logic differentiation between termination and resignation scenarios per UAE labor law; Playwright cannot verify if calculation formulas differ correctly

not_testable_tickets.summary: Hiring date needs to be updated
not_testable_tickets.reason: Backend data consistency issue - involves payroll transaction history validation and data modification constraints that are business logic, not UI testable

not_testable_tickets.summary: Incorrect days worked in gratuity calculation
not_testable_tickets.reason: Backend calculation bug - involves hardcoded daily wage formula (Basic Salary / 30) and days worked count accuracy, which are mathematical computations not UI verifiable
Backend calculation methodology - involves inclusive date calculation logic and comparison with external calculators, which are business logic computations

not_testable_tickets.summary: Investigate EOS pro rated mid month pay behavior for deduction
not_testable_tickets.reason: Backend payroll calculation - involves pro-rated salary deduction logic for mid-month departures, which is mathematical computation not UI testable
Backend calculation bug - involves month-counting logic and leave days calculation accuracy (16.82 days discrepancy), which are mathematical computations
Feature request cancelled - no current implementation to test
Backend calculation issue - system splits SIF file generation based on arrears logic; cannot verify file generation or splitting logic with Playwright
Data inconsistency across backend modules; requires database verification and cross-system data synchronization checks beyond UI testing
Documentation/help article clarification request; not a testable UI bug or feature

not_testable_tickets.summary: Urgent : EOS Gratuity calculation Error / Bug
not_testable_tickets.reason: Backend calculation logic issue - gratuity amount varies based on departure reason; requires mathematical verification not UI testing
Backend calculation issue - unpaid leave days handling in gratuity formula; requires verification of calculated amounts not UI elements

not_testable_tickets.summary: Wrong Total Service duration in End of Service
not_testable_tickets.reason: Backend calculation issue - service duration calculation logic; requires verification of computed duration values not UI display

focus_area_definitions.sidebar_expanded: Capture sidebar menu with submenus visible, highlight current selection
focus_area_definitions.modal_dialog: Capture modal/dialog centered with background dimmed, show all form fields
focus_area_definitions.dropdown_expanded: Capture dropdown with ALL options visible, highlight current selection
focus_area_definitions.data_table: Capture table with headers and at least 5 data rows visible
focus_area_definitions.form_section: Capture complete form with all fields, labels, and validation states
focus_area_definitions.accordion_expanded: Capture accordion section fully expanded showing all content
focus_area_definitions.tab_content: Capture tab bar showing all tabs with active tab content below
focus_area_definitions.main_content: Capture main content area excluding sidebar, include breadcrumbs
focus_area_definitions.full_page: Full page scroll capture for comprehensive documentation
